body.name: Ospelelf Foldable Spiral Clipboard Folio with Storage Zipper Pouch, 5 Plastic Folders with 10 Pockets,Refillable Lined Notepad (11" x 8.5"), Hardcover Project Organizer with 39 Stickers (Purple)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 59 mins
features: 【Premium Materials】Unlike other flimsy folders, it features a sturdy metal clip with gripping, double screw coil, and reinforced corners to prevent document damage. The PP folder, PVC pouch, elastic pen loop and closure keep everything organized and secure, avoiding tears, breaks, and lost accessories. The removable notepad with 25 pages won't bleed ink. Our clipboard folio is designed to address common issues found in low-quality organizers.

【Secure Storage】The portfolio organizer has a clear pouch with a zipper that provides a secure place to store documents, notes, or other items when you're on the go. The clipboard comes with 5 plastic folders that have 10 pockets, fitting all standard US letter-size sheets (11" x 8.5"). It is a great way to keep your papers organized and easily accessible.

【Portable Efficiency】Measuring at 12.2*10*0.79 inches, it easily fits into your work bag, laptop case, large handbag, or backpack. The surface is hard enough so you can write and draw on it even when you're standing, making it ideal for presentations or note-taking during meetings. The clip provides easy gripping and can hold up to 80-100 sheets of paper, ensuring that your notes stay secure.

【Versatile Organizer】The spiral clipboard folio with folders is a versatile tool for students, teacher, nurse, professionals, artists, travelers, business, school, and anyone who needs to stay organized. Perfect for storing notes, documents, sketches, and more. It is a great gift for friends, family, and loved ones on birthdays, the school year, Christmas, Thanksgiving, or New Year,etc.

【Customer Service】Ospelelf is dedicated to providing excellent customer service, and always available to answer any questions or concerns.Your 100% satisfaction is our mission. If you have any questions about the folding clipboard, please feel free to contact us and we will work out the best solution for you.

reviews.reviewText: THis has been so helpful in planning my wedding. A place for everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds a lot
reviews.reviewText: I use this to keep organized at work, I print my orders daily and this helps me keep track of what delivers on what day and who is delivering it. Iput about 30-40 pages per side of each divider and it doesn't get Bulky when closed. Having the clip board on the front is perfect for my pad of paper and daily notes I take. Good purchase, would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for work
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to keep myself organized at work. I constantly have a lot of paperwork that ends up getting lost. It’s super cute. It’s a great cost for what I needed it for. The only down fall is don’t keep anything to large in the zipper portion of the binder. It will cause the binder to become bulky and difficult to write on. I like how easy it is to take papers in and out of. I will definitely purchase again when it becomes dirty. Fabric is hard to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, high quality folio binder at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: This is a REALLY nice binder - very good quality and I like it a lot. LOTS of positives with this! The fabric is really nice and it has an upscale look and feel to it, especially with the gold color clip and quality cotton, linen cloth. It's great for organizing and with the two pockets on the inner front and back as well, it's actually capable of holding three different pads of paper at one time (if you actually wanted it to). I have no idea why the photos say the back inner pocket is expandable though - as it is not. Another feature I really love is the large, clear plastic zipper pouch in the very back behind all the inner plastic files. That has REALLY come in handy in a way I never expected for all sorts of small items, like sticky notes, rubber bands, paper clips, pens, pencils, etc. I basically use it as my notebook "junk drawer". ;-) It comes with a generous amount of labels for the file folders too, which is nice. I also LOVE that it has an elastic band to hold the folio closed, which I honestly do not know what I would do without. It's really sturdy as well.This elastic band also, however, brings me to the "downsides", which is why I unfortunately am giving this only 4 stars instead of 5 stars. This band is absolutely REQUIRED to secure the pad on the front when it is being moved around, yet the pad is still not protected from getting knocked askew or completely off, or even mangled during any kind of transport. And it simply feels too time consuming to have to remove the pad and place it inside the binder in between any major transport. It just doesn't make a lot of sense to have the paper pad on the front without a cover.What would honestly make this entire design PERFECT, is a third cover to place over the front pad cover. Or another option could be to have a second elastic band, to secure the inner file folders while using a pad with the clip inside the cover, instead on the outside front (hope I'm making sense!) As for the inner files themselves, I think they should all be either darker rainbow colors, or all pastel colors. The red one in the front just did not blend color pallet wise with the others, so I actually cut it out completely with scissors. My eyes simply couldn't handle the color clash - I can't stand pink and red together, but I also realize that's just me. My third negative is the pen holder. Though I LOVE that it even has a pen holder, it sticks out and hangs about in an awkward fashion to where it gets in the way and gets caught on things. I think it ought to be sewn into the inner seam facing inward, so that the pen would then be securely tucked into the folio instead. Though the paper pad it comes with is cute being pink and all, the paper peeled (or rather fell) right off of the backing almost immediately. Color wise, I wish there were more choices, as I'm not THAT crazy about any of the options. I do like the green okay, but I'd LOVE to have it in brown, beige, or a sage green!Overall, it is a great product for the $21 price though!! And it is definitely a handy office product for organizational purposes and everyday practical use if you aren't planning on transporting it much! So I would recommend it. I had a REALLY hard time deciding between 4 or 5 stars on this one. But in the end, I simply had to factor in all the little things that frustrated me a bit. Do keep in mind it is ONLY spiral bound, so you cannot add anything to it in that way - no 3 ring binder, hole punched notebook paper additions are available in this folio. Everything simply goes in the files.
